synopsis.text: Even the most perfect girl can seem unattainable, especially when she already has a boyfriend. But what if you could create your own? Enter Hiroshi Karigari, a college student and aspiring mad scientist, who builds an android replica of his dream girl, Marie. To conceal her true origins, Hiroshi introduces Marie as his sister, but things quickly become complicated when Marie crosses paths with the human Marie at the tennis club. As if that wasn't enough, the sentient android develops genuine feelings for her creator, leading to a series of unexpected challenges. Will Hiroshi navigate the complexities of love and life with his robotic creation, or will the complications prove too much to handle? Join Marie and Hiroshi on this unpredictable journey filled with humor, heart, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
